name: Going Viral
description:
Going viral is a short game created in 72 hours for the minijam Bugs with the limitation being that you must play as a bad guy. 

Take the role of the evil genius looking to release his latest spyware onto the world, during the upload process things go wrong and errors occur, find and fix the errors as quick as possible to avoid bugs from infecting the system.  If too many bugs enter the system you will fail your objective. 

[ Easier version of the game is available as a download ]

Eternal Terminal by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3717-eternal-terminal
